author: arminw
msg: - add new beans showing how to handle exception and rollback behavior of beans
- fix bug in odmg behavior in managed environments, do cleanup of cache and locks
in Synchronization#afterCompletion call (here we now if an distributed-tx was successful or
not), instead doing all cleanup in Synchronization#beforeCompletion
- move assign of FK for 1:1 relations from lock method call to commit call of the
main object (this guarantee that the referenced object is already stored and the extracted
